content.1: He cried also in mine ears with a loud voice, saying, Cause them that have charge over the city to draw near, even every man
content.2: And, behold, six men came from the way of the higher gate, which lieth toward the north, and every man a slaughter weapon in his hand; and one man among them
content.3: And the glory of the God of Israel was gone up from the cherub, whereupon he was, to the threshold of the house. And he called to the man clothed with linen, which
content.5: And to the others he said in mine hearing, Go ye after him through the city, and smite: let not your eye spare, neither have ye pity:
content.7: And he said unto them, Defile the house, and fill the courts with the slain: go ye forth. And they went forth, and slew in the city.
content.8: And it came to pass, while they were slaying them, and I was left, that I fell upon my face, and cried, and said, Ah Lord
content.9: Then said he unto me, The iniquity of the house of Israel and Judah
content.10: And as for me also, mine eye shall not spare, neither will I have pity,
content.11: And, behold, the man clothed with linen, which
